twitch_info.title: I Wanna Kill The Blue Mage 100% - 1:26:53
twitch_info.description: Every day, I open TJ's stream and sit down with a 100 pack of arnold palmor. I wait until the stream starts, and then it begins. I open the box and force myself to drink the arnold palmors. I have stage V diabetes and will die soon, but I know it is what TJ likes. I feel at peace knowing that it is what TJ would have wanted. Please no arnold palmorino.
